start.state: Strip poker? It beats Insult Beer Pong, I suppose.

case.state: Sorry, dear. I promise you'll look just as darling without it.
Finally, something worth looking at!
It's just your ~clothing~, ~name~, no need to be shy.
Not bad, ~name~. You could give Guybrush a run for his pieces-o'-eight.
To repay you for today's sights, of course.
That's the second biggest penis I've ever seen!

Well, perhaps it isn't hot enough today.
